level.heading: Prepayment premium, fee or charge.
level.text: A lender shall not include in a covered loan or collect or attempt to collect any prepayment premium, fee, or charge in violation of Chapter 33 of Title 28.

level.heading: Emergency Act Amendments
level.text: For temporary (90 day) addition of section, see ยง 212 of Home Loan Protection Emergency Act of 2002 (D.C. Act 14-295, March 1, 2002, 49 DCR 2534).

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For Law 14-132, see notes following ยง 26-1151.01.
